pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semi-Supervised Bayesian Mixture Models Incorporating Batch Correction // Semi-supervised and unsupervised Bayesian mixture models that simultaneously infer the cluster/class structure and a batch correction. Densities available are the multivariate normal and the multivariate t. The model sampler is implemented in C++. This package is aimed at analysis of low-dimensional data generated across several batches. See Coleman et al. (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.01.14.476352 for details of the model.
